Title: Fragments
Plot: As the team are knocked unconscious we find out how Jack, Toshiko, Ianto and Owen were initiated into Torchwood.
GuestStars: Amy Manson, Kai Owen, Heather Craney, Skye Bennett, Julian Lewis Jones, Simon Shackleton, Gareth Jones, Clare Clifford, Noriko Aida, Andrea Lowe, Richard Lloyd-King, Catherine Morris, Selva Rasalingam, Paul Kasey
